core:executeProcessAction.core:comment: Prepare reqeust and invoke CheckIn service. Returns FAIL if the service invoke failed - an error will already have been displayed in this case. Returns RESPONSEFAULT if a response of some sort was received but contained an error. In this case an error value has (probably) been stored in the item. Returns SUCCESS if a Success response was received.

Prepare request and invoke CheckOut service. Returns FAIL if the service invoke failed - an error will already have been displayed in this case. Returns RESPONSEFAULT if a response of some sort was received but contained an error. In this case an error value has (probably) been stored in the item. Returns SUCCESS if a Success response was received.
Prepare request and invoke DoVoid service. Used after an authroisation has been obtained. Same outcomes are possible as DoCapture etc.

core:outcomeLink.core:condition: process.payPalTenderItem.error.errorId == '579063' || process.payPalTenderItem.error.errorId == '580034' || process.payPalTenderItem.error.errorId == '580036' || process.payPalTenderItem.error.errorId == '589009' || process.payPalTenderItem.error.errorId == '580035' || process.payPalTenderItem.error.errorId == '529010' || process.payPalTenderItem.error.errorId == '579065' || process.payPalTenderItem.error.errorId == '580033'

core:outcomeLink.core:comment: PayerID (preferably) or EmailAddress must be available

core:param.value: Error in PayPal Tender, Target Account Credentials
core:param.name: enactor.coreUI.LogMessage

core:state.core:comment: Issue change if required. TODO - determine if change is actually needed before starting change process?
